TopicTitle: [1.2.0] Toolbar 1.7.13 - Common API for draggable/resizable buttons toolbar

Articles.Content: I've used Blizzy's bar since its first release. It's gotten better and better. My woes are from the stock toolbar; that monstrosity that sucks up interface space I need for Blizzy's. Is there any way to remove it altogether? I just don't want it. I want to have my own skin for each screen to send instructions to the program. These guys are right up there with the Microsoft Office 2010 team at creating appealing and functional skins.

Is there any way to remove it altogether?

While you can't remove the stock toolbar entirely, this mod is probably the closest you'll get.

I suggest you mention this to the other mod developers that "require" the stock toolbar.

Ship Manifest has a means to "hot swap" between the stock and Blizzy's toolbar. I don't get rid of the "hard coded ones (sorry), but at least you get the choice.

Other mod developers are free to examine my code to see how I did it. They are also free to use and alter the code to fit their needs.

It is not very painful, and provides the best of both worlds.

Just saying...
